sentence.Network_en: He chose his words rather infelicitously.

list.abs: He chose his words rather infelicitously ., 他言辞非常不当.
an infelicitous remark ; infelicitous phrasing ; the infelicitous typesetting was due to illegible copy ., 不恰当的评论 ; 不贴切的措辞 ; 错误的排版是因为原稿潦草难认.
The infelicitous typesetting was due to illegible copy ., 错误的排版是由于难以辨认的拷贝造成的.
infelicitous circumstances ; unhappy caravans , straggling afoot through swamps and canebrakes-American Guide Series .悲惨的环境；不幸的商队，脱离了队伍徒步走在沼泽和藤丛之中——《美国导游丛书》。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
